alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 31 at 5:51AM EDT until August 01 at 12:42PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Major flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 29.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 AM EDT Sunday was 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 15.3 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.6 feet on 05/10/2009. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 5 pm EDT.
